*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to James F. Perry, Matamoros, June 20, 1832. Texan affairs moving satisfactorily in Mexico.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Matamoras */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="06-20-1832">June 20 [1832]*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dr *person_mentioned*Brother */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Sister*/person_mentioned*,*/p*
*p*I wrote you a few days since by *person_mentioned*Mr. Evans*/person_mentioned*, and now drop a line by an *person_mentioned*express */person_mentioned*going direct to *location_mentioned*Brazoria*/location_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*I left *person_mentioned*Austin */person_mentioned*in *location_mentioned*Saltillo */location_mentioned*studying Spanish in which I think he will make considerable progress by*date_mentioned n="Fall-1832"> next fall.*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p*I have had a very hard and hot trip—the *location_mentioned*country */location_mentioned*is all parched up—in many places *location_mentioned*between here and Tampico*/location_mentioned* it has not rained in 8 months.—*/p*
*p*Our *location_mentioned*Texas */location_mentioned*affairs are getting on very well in this *location_mentioned*quarter*/location_mentioned*, but I hear there is some trouble at *location_mentioned*Anahuac*/location_mentioned*, I hope nothing serious and that peace and harmony will prevail in the *location_mentioned*colony*/location_mentioned*.— You, of course have nothing to do with these matters but I wish you to write me a little news, also how you like your *location_mentioned*place*/location_mentioned*, and how you are getting on—what is your prospect for a Crop and how the Stock thrive etc.*/p*
*p*Remember me affly. to all the *person_mentioned*children*/person_mentioned*. I leave in a few days for *location_mentioned*Saltillo */location_mentioned*where I shall expect to hear from you.*/p*
*p*Farewell—remember me to your *person_mentioned*neighbors*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*S. F. Austin */person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*p*[Addressed:] Al *person_mentioned*Snr. James F. Perry*/person_mentioned* *location_mentioned*Brazoria */location_mentioned*Care of *person_mentioned*John Austin.*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
